title: Community Treasury Proposal: Extend SoulofJacobeh for Community Ambassador through Feb 15, 2022
body:
Purpose 
Extend the Community Ambassadorship of Soul of Jacobeh (Jacob Luxe) for 6 months, from August 16, 2021 to February 15, 2022.

Background
Soul has been integral in organizing and administering the Creator Coin and $RLY Discord and the Rally.io Wiki. Notable projects include security (keeping our Discord free of spam and bots) and education (wiki + adding numerous commands for education snippets).

Scope
* ~40 hours per week time commitment
* Progress directly reviewed by Jason Maestas
* 6 month term, community has ability to terminate engagement at any time

Roles/Responsibilities
* Boost engagement, education, and transparency within Rally Discord.
* Administer Rally Discord. (Discovery, security, etc)
* Administer the Rally.io Wiki and update its content.
* Moderate Rally.io Forums.
* Manage Discord Moderator djnuggets.
* Record and post Rally.io Community Calls to Rally.io YouTube.

Compensation
* 4,500 USDC per month
* 4,000 RLY per month

Voting
* A "Yes" vote approves the 6-month extension.
* A "No" cancels the extension and ends the current ambassadorship on August 15, 2021.
author: 0xBbD378951fB947eef963C096F46d04420F97905B
